p: Another important aspect observed following in vivo application of basil extracts is the erythema index which expresses a small decrease, probably due to the active ingredients of the extracts that seem to have a beneficial potential to heal skin lesions, as reported by other studies as well [ 62, 63]. Collectively, these results suggest the anti-inflammatory and wound healing potential of the hydro-alcoholic basil extracts, OBHE and OBAE.
